comment: to use the e-mail notification feature, please adjust the keywords' values accordingly and change this file's name to 'jobrequest-conf.json'

confList.smtp: your institution's SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol)
confList.submitButtonText: text to be displayed on the submit button (front-end). E.g., Submit SEM Job Request
confList.requesterEmailKeyword: the keyword in the schema that contains the requester's email address
confList.operatorNameKeyword: the keyword in the schema that contains the operator's name
confList.responsibleOperatorEmail: email address of the responsible person
confList.confirmationEmailSubject: email subject for confirmation email (for requester). Example: SEM Job Request confirmation
confList.confirmationHeaderText:
confirmation header text must be within div tags. Example:
This is a confirmation email for your SEM Request with the following details:
confList.requestReceivedEmailSubject: email subject for receiving request (for operator). Example: New SEM Job Request
confList.requestReceivedHeaderText:
received header text must be within div tags. Example:
You've just got a new SEM job request with the following details:
confList.requestAcceptedSubject: email subject for when the request is accepted (for requesster). Example: SEM job request accepted
confList.requestAcceptedHeaderText:
request accepted header text must be within div tags. Example:
Your request has been accepted and currently being investigated.
